lines.text: [Norman and Angela walk in on Levon and his girlfriend making out in the Ark]
You know, Levon, the Ark is not a make-out place.
Norman, he's fifteen. Every place is a make-out place.
He's always stood up for you. I'm not gonna stand here and watch you bad mouth him!
Norman, I said only members of your family!
This is my family! I'm not Noah, I'm Norman! And on Norman's ark, there's a place for everybody!
Angela you can't afford this!
You're not the only one with the dream.
Five ninety-nine? That doesn't look like a phone number!
They don't need a boat. They need a dad.
Oh that's really sweet; you should send greeting cards. But not before you finish the ark!
How was your game?
You mean the one you missed?
I'm sorry Norman, but I gotta quit too. When the Norman I know comes back, give me a call.
Hey Ernie! That Norman's not coming back.
I thought the dream died, but I guess it just went to sleep for a while.
How was your night, Norman? I slept like a baby!
You have been chosen!
Everything was fine until you started building this stupid thing!
No, no. Nothing's been fine since your mom died.
